commit_message: Update CEnum compat
No hard exit for illegal target_dbn in opt_md, opt_sd
Remove unnecessary dependency IOCapture

Capture output for movie more reliably

Redirect cstdio movie output to a file instead of trying to capture it
in a String, as this is currently unreliable for cstdio (IOCapture.jl
and Suppressor.jl).
Add movie_capture function to capture intermediate steps of opt_md and opt_sd
Flush cstdio when suppressing output from C
random_seq: use vienna_to_pairs, xuseq_to_str
Regenerate bindings for DssOpt_jll v1.0.5 (still in development)
Bindings: define C_EXIT_SUCCESS and use it
Silence unwanted printing to stdout in tests
opt_md: throw ArgumentError on illegal sequence constraints
Allow setting score function constants in opt_md, opt_sd
Regenerate bindings for DssOpt_jll v1.0.5 (still in development)
Add TODO note to use vienna_to_pairs once available
Better interfacing to the ccalls
Add random_seq(dbn) function
Bindings generator: extract C comments and function prototypes
opt_md, opt_sd: add seed to docstrings, and print seed in verbose mode
Add seed option to opt_sd
Add seed option to opt_md
Add more vars to `GC.@preserve` to avoid segfaults in ccall
Add Aqua tests
Improve tests, test that all bases and basepairs are legal
Add opt_sd sequence opt function
Add docstring for opt_md and add literature reference to README
Use `GC.@preserve` to protect pointer from GC during ccall
Remove commented-out code
Update .gitignore for generated files
Bindings generator: save package versions used of DssOpt_jll and Clang
opt_md: suport seq_constraints_hard
Export opt_md, basic tests for opt_md
Initial working implementation of opt_md called via shared library

Rename functions that call executables, refactor code

- `opt_md` is now `exe_opt_md`, which calls the executable `opt-md`
- `opt_sd` is now `exe_opt_sd`, which calls the executable `opt-sd`
- `opt_sd_gsl` is now `exe_opt_sd_gsl`, which calls the executable `opt-sd-gsl`

This is in preparation for new functions `opt_md` etc that call
directly into the shared library.
Regenerate bindings for DssOpt_jll v1.0.4
Make sure to use DssOpt_jll v1.0.1, improve generator script
Bump compat for Clang, fix compat for DssOpt_jll
add README
add compat sections to Project.toml
fix errors for CRLF line handling
improve tests: all in one outer testset, show test progress
add support for opt-sd, opt-sd-gsl programs
opt_md: add verbose option, improve error handling
add all opt_md options
initial checkin, opt_md works but without options
clarify LICENSE
Initial commit
